Title: Establishes the crimes of sex trafficking of a vulnerable person and predatory sex trafficking
Summary: Establishes the crimes of sex trafficking of a vulnerable person and predatory sex trafficking when a person intentionally advances or profits from prostitution of a vulnerable person.
LawCode: Amd ยง230.34-a, add ยง130.97, Pen L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to sex trafficking of a vulnerable person
